repairedDockerfile:
# Select linux install with basic nodejs 
FROM node:argon 

# Create app directory 
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app/twilio-contact-center-docker && rm -rf /usr/src/app/twilio-contact-center-docker
WORKDIR /usr/src/app/twilio-contact-center-docker 

# Install app dependencies 
ADD . /usr/src/app/twilio-contact-center-docker/ 

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

ENV port 5000 
EXPOSE 5000 
CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
